Package applicationTools

Class LocalDateTimeApplicationTool

java.lang.Object
applicationTools.LocalDateTimeApplicationTool
public class LocalDateTimeApplicationTool extends Object
Utility class for handling LocalDateTime operations in JavaFX applications. TODO [] this was the first time class but I created a new one that does more, so this should be migrated to TimeTool

  • Method Details

    • parseToLocalDateTime

      public static LocalDateTime parseToLocalDateTime(String dateString, String timeString)
      Parses date and time strings and returns a LocalDateTime object.
      Parameters:
      dateString - The date string to be parsed.
      timeString - The time string to be parsed.
      Returns:
      LocalDateTime object representing the parsed date and time, or null if parsing fails.

    • parseToLocalDateTimeForDB

      public static LocalDateTime parseToLocalDateTimeForDB(String dateString, String timeString)
      Parses date and time strings for database storage.
      Parameters:
      dateString - The date string to be parsed.
      timeString - The time string to be parsed.
      Returns:
      LocalDateTime object representing the parsed date and time, or null if parsing fails.

    • adjustDateFormat

      private static String adjustDateFormat(String dateString)
      Adjusts the date format to ensure consistent character format in the string
      Parameters:
      dateString - The original date string.
      Returns:
      The adjusted date string with leading zeros.

    • replaceSlash

      private static String replaceSlash(String inputString)
      Replaces slashes with hyphens in the input string for transition from input.
      Parameters:
      inputString - The input string containing slashes.
      Returns:
      The input string with slashes replaced by hyphens.
